channel.title: [PI] I Keep Getting this error! [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, Ive been trying to create a highscores, but i keep getting this error when i open up highscores.php. Please help me Ill rep++ oyu and maybe give you like 5$!
[code=abap]Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /home/uiotube/public_html/high/functions.php on line 563 Table 'uiotube_high.skills' doesn't exist[/code]
If your more of a picture person here ya go: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/281yc77.jpg[/img]
Here is my Functions.php code: [ftp=ftp:///C:/Users/Tyler/Desktop/functions.php.txt]file:///C:/Users/Tyler/Desktop/functions.php.txt[/ftp]
